projects.name: AR Discovery App

projects.name: Practical AI Chatbot Development
projects.description: Developed a customized ChatGPT clone using the MERN stack, leveraging MongoDB for data storage, Express for API development, React for dynamic user interfaces, and Node.js for backend logic. Implemented advanced authentication features, including secure user login and registration with JWT tokens and HTTP-only cookies, ensuring robust security measures.

projects.name: Stock Price Prediction of High Frequency Data
projects.description: Trained a Python-based system for high-frequency data-driven stock price predictions using Linear Regression algorithms. Optimized investment decisions and fostered data driven strategies through the implementation of advanced algorithms.
